content.query:
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize //Session_ID=any(SessionId),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId),
    //Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Time=max(EndTime),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=min(Status), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass)
    by RequestId
| summarize ElapsedTime_min=bin(anyif(((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m),Start_Time > ago(30d)),1),
    //Session_ID=any(Session_ID), 
   // Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,
    Start_Time=any(Start_Time), 
    End_Time=any(End_Time),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=any(Status),
    Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type)
    ,Resource_class=any(Resource_class) 
    by Request_ID
| where End_Time > ago(365d)
| summarize count() by Status, bin(End_Time,5m)
| render barchart
content.title: Query Completion Count by End Time - 5m buckets

content.json: Use the buttons below to filter the next chart for Success or Failed queries. In many cases a failed query may not have a 'Command' column populated depending on what stage the query failed in.

content.query:
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize //Session_ID=any(SessionId),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId),
    //Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Time=max(EndTime),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=min(Status), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass)
    by RequestId
| summarize ElapsedTime_min=bin(anyif(((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m),Start_Time > ago(30d)),1),
    //Session_ID=any(Session_ID), 
   // Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,
    Start_Time=any(Start_Time), 
    End_Time=any(End_Time),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=any(Status),
    Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type)
    ,Resource_class=any(Resource_class) 
    by Request_ID
| where Status has '{QueryCompletionType}'
| order by Start_Time
content.title: Query Completions - use above buttons to filter

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'  and  LogicalServerName_s == 'lasr-sqldwdb-eastus2-prd'
    | where action_name_s in ('DATABASE AUTHENTICATION SUCCEEDED','DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED')
    | project SourceSystem,client_tls_version_d,succeeded_s,session_id_d,client_ip_s,session_server_principal_name_s,server_principal_name_s,database_principal_name_s,application_name_s,host_name_s,TimeGenerated
    | summarize count() by succeeded_s,bin(TimeGenerated,1m)
    | render barchart
content.title: Database Authentication success/failure rate

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'  and  LogicalServerName_s == 'lasr-sqldwdb-eastus2-prd'
    | where action_name_s in ('DATABASE AUTHENTICATION SUCCEEDED','DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED')
    | where succeeded_s has '{AuthResult}'
    | project SourceSystem,client_tls_version_d,succeeded_s,session_id_d,client_ip_s,session_server_principal_name_s,server_principal_name_s,database_principal_name_s,application_name_s,host_name_s,TimeGenerated
    | order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Database Authentication success/failure rate
Adaptive Cache Used vs Hit Percentage

content.query:
let databaseResourceName = '{DatabaseResourceName}';
//Weighted query steps
SynapseSqlPoolRequestSteps 
| where _ResourceId == databaseResourceName
| where RowCount > 0
| summarize sum(RowCount) by RequestId, OperationType
| order by sum_RowCount desc
| limit 20
| render columnchart
content.title: 20 Largest Query Steps by Most Rows Moved
20 Largest Query Steps by Most Rows Moved

let databaseResourceName = '{DatabaseResourceName}';
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == databaseResourceName
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize //Session_ID=any(SessionId),
    Request_ID=any(RequestId),
   // Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Time=max(EndTime),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=min(Status), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass)
    by RequestId
| summarize ElapsedTime_min=bin(anyif(((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m),Start_Time > ago(30d)),1),
    //Session_ID=any(Session_ID), 
   // Submit_Time=any(Submit_Time) ,
    Start_Time=any(Start_Time),

    Command=any(Command),
    Status=any(Status),
    Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type)
    ,Resource_class=any(Resource_class) 
    by Request_ID
| where Request_ID == '{RequestID}'
content.title: Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to view details

content.query:
SynapseSqlPoolRequestSteps 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where RequestId == '{RequestID}' //Put your QueryID here
| where Status != 'Running'
| summarize max(StartTime),max(EndTime),max(RequestId),max(OperationType),max(RowCount),max(Command),max(Status) by StepIndex
| order by StepIndex asc
content.title: Query Plan
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to view the plan

content.json:
## Search Criteria
Use the following fields to search either using a query text snippet or using a Request ID. If using a query text snippet, try to keep it as simple as possible becuase minor changes in formatting may cause your queries not to show up in the results. It's best to pick something like a table name, then choose the proper query from the list that will populate.

content.query:
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize 
    Request_ID=max(RequestId),  
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime), 
    QueryText = any(Command), 
    Last_Status=min(Status),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass) 
    by RequestId
| extend Elapsed_Time_s=(End_Time - Start_Time)/1s
| where QueryText has '{QueryTextSnippet}'
and RequestId has '{RequestIdSearch}'
| summarize 
    Executions = count(),
    SampleQID = any(RequestId),
    Elapsed_Time_s=max(Elapsed_Time_s)
    by QueryText
| order by Elapsed_Time_s
content.title: Matching Queries

content.query:
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where RequestId == '{SampleQID}'
| summarize  
    Request_ID=max(RequestId),   
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime), 
    Command=max(Command), 
    Last_Status=min(Status),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass) 
    by RequestId
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Start_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| join kind=inner
    (SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | summarize 
        Request_ID=max(RequestId),   
        Start_Time=max(StartTime),
        End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime), 
        End_Time=max(EndTime), 
        Command=max(Command), 
        Last_Status=min(Status),
        Statement_Type=max(StatementType),
        Resource_class=max(ResourceClass) 
        by RequestId
    //| extend elapsedTime_sec = (End_Time - Start_Time)/1s
    | extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Start_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
    )
on Command 
| project Request_ID1,Start_Time1,End_Compile_Time1,End_Time1,Last_Status1,Statement_Type1,Resource_class1,elapsedTime_sec1
content.title: All Executions of Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see individual executions

content.query:
SynapseSqlPoolRequestSteps 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where RequestId == '{RequestId}' //Put your QueryID here
| where Status != 'Running'
| summarize max(StartTime),max(EndTime),max(RequestId),max(OperationType),max(RowCount),max(Command),max(Status) by StepIndex
| order by StepIndex asc

parameters.name: Query_Submit_Time
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
    | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
    | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
    | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | where RequestId_s =='{RequestId}'
    | summarize 
        Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t)
        by RequestId_s
        | project Submit_Time

parameters.name: Query_End_Compile_Time
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
    | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
    | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
    | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | where RequestId_s =='{RequestId}'
    | summarize 
        End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t) 
        by RequestId_s
        | project End_Compile_Time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
        | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
        | where Resource  == 'LASR-SQLDWDB-PRD'
        | where StatementType_s =='CreateStatistics'
    | summarize 
        Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
        Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
        Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
        Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
        End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
        End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
        Command=max(Command_s), 
        Last_Status=min(Status_s),
        Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
        Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
        by RequestId_s
        | where Submit_Time > datetime('{Query_Submit_Time}') and End_Time < datetime('{Query_End_Compile_Time}')// or RequestId_s == '{RequestId}'
content.title: All possibly related auto-stats statements based on time

content.json: All Charts on this page are based on the last 7 days of data

content.title: Top 15 Most Rebuilds by Table

content.query:
//Build cache count by day
let databaseResourceName = '{DatabaseResourceName}';
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == databaseResourceName
| where StatementType == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
| where Command == "{QueryText}"
| where ResourceClass != ""
| project Command,TimeGenerated,RequestId
| summarize count() by Command,bin(TimeGenerated,24h)
| limit 20
| render timechart
content.title: Rebuilds per Day for Selected Table
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see runs by day

content.title: Rebuild Count by Table by Day
content.noDataMessage: Only tables with more than 7 total rebuilds will show up. If no talbes with that many rebuilds are found this chart will be empty

content.query:
let databaseResourceName = '{DatabaseResourceName}';
//Long-Running Queries - Just Actual Queries
//If 'Command' is empty - you need to set a bigger time window, the older record with the command is outside of your window
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == databaseResourceName
| where StatementType == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
| summarize          Start_Time=max(StartTime),      End_Time=max(EndTime),      Command=max(Command),       Statement_Type=max(StatementType),     Resource_class=max(ResourceClass)      by RequestId
| join kind= inner
(
    SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
    | where _ResourceId  == databaseResourceName
    | where StatementType == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
    | where StatementType == 'BuildReplicatedTableCache'
    | where EndTime > ago(7d)
    | where StartTime > ago(7d)
    | extend elapsedTime_min = (EndTime - StartTime)/1m
    | order by elapsedTime_min desc
    | project RequestId,elapsedTime_min 
)
on RequestId
| order by elapsedTime_min desc
| project RequestId,Start_Time,End_Time,Elapsed_Time=round(elapsedTime_min,1) ,Command
| limit 15
content.title: Top 15 Elapsed Time per Rebuild

content.json:
## Select a Principal or Application name to filter results - leave to 'unset' to view all results
SQL Auditing must be enabled and sending to the same Log Analytics Workspace for this page to work.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: User to filter subsequent queries - leave to 'unset' for all users
parameters.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
| where LogicalServerName == '{LogicalServerName}'
| summarize by ServerPrincipalName

parameters.name: Application
parameters.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
| where LogicalServerName == '{LogicalServerName}'
| summarize by ApplicationName

content.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
| where LogicalServerName == '{LogicalServerName}'
| where DurationMs > 0
| extend duration_seconds = DurationMs /1000.0
| where Statement != 'select @@version'
| where Statement != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
| where ServerPrincipalName has '{User}'
| where ApplicationName has '{Application}'
| project ServerPrincipalName, EventTime, LogicalServerName, DurationMs, duration_seconds, AffectedRows, Statement, ApplicationName
| summarize duration_seconds = round(sum(duration_seconds)) , query_count = count() by EventDay = bin(EventTime,1d), UserName = ServerPrincipalName, Application = ApplicationName 
| order by EventDay, duration_seconds desc
content.title: Query Summary for Selected User {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
| where LogicalServerName == '{LogicalServerName}'
| where DurationMs > 0
| extend duration_seconds = DurationMs /1000.0
| where Statement != 'select @@version'
| where Statement != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
| where ServerPrincipalName has '{User}'
| where ApplicationName has '{Application}'
| project ServerPrincipalName, EventTime, LogicalServerName, DurationMs, duration_seconds, AffectedRows, Statement, ApplicationName
| summarize duration_seconds = round(sum(duration_seconds)) , query_count = count() by EventDay = bin(EventTime,1d), UserName = ServerPrincipalName, Application = ApplicationName 
| order by EventDay, duration_seconds desc
content.title: Query Summary for Selected User {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
    | where  LogicalServerName == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where DurationMs > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = DurationMs /1000.0
    | where Statement != 'select @@version'
    | where Statement != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
    | where ServerPrincipalName has '{User}'
    | where ApplicationName has '{Application}'
    | project DatabaseName= DatabaseName, UserName= ServerPrincipalName, EventTime= EventTime, Host= HostName, duration_seconds = round(duration_seconds), Statement, QuerySource = ApplicationName , AffectedRows
    | project-reorder DatabaseName, UserName, Host, EventTime, duration_seconds, Statement, QuerySource
content.title: Queries {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
SQLSecurityAuditEvents 
    | where  LogicalServerName == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where DurationMs > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = DurationMs /1000.0
    | where Statement != 'select @@version'
    | where Statement != 'SELECT @@SPID;'
    | where ServerPrincipalName has '{User}'
    | where ApplicationName has '{Application}'
    | project DatabaseName= DatabaseName, UserName= ServerPrincipalName, EventTime= EventTime, Host= HostName, duration_seconds = round(duration_seconds), Statement, QuerySource = ApplicationName , AffectedRows
    | project-reorder AffectedRows,DatabaseName, UserName, Host, EventTime, duration_seconds, Statement, QuerySource

SQLSecurityAuditEvents
| where  LogicalServerName == "{LogicalServerName}"
    | where DurationMs > 0
| extend Duration = round(DurationMs /1000.0)
| extend TimeBin = case (datetime_part("Hour",TimeGenerated) in (6,7,8,9,10,11,12), "Morning_6-12", datetime_part("Hour",TimeGenerated) in (13,14,15,16,17,18), "Afternoon_12-18", "Overnight_18-6")
| where ServerPrincipalName has '{User}'
| where ApplicationName has '{Application}'
| summarize QueryDuration = sum(Duration) by EventTime = bin(EventTime, 1d), TimeBin
content.title: Query Activity by time - sum(Duration) {User} {Application}
content.noDataMessage: Select a user to see query activity

content.query:
SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute') and RequestId == '{RequestId1}'
| summarize 
    Request_ID=any(RequestId),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Time=max(EndTime),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=min(Status), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass)
    by RequestId
| summarize Start_Time=any(Start_Time), End_Time=any(End_Time),ElapsedTime_min=anyif((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m,Start_Time > ago(30d)),Command=any(Command),Status=any(Status),Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type),Resource_class=any(Resource_class) by Request_ID
| project Request_ID,ElapsedTime_min,Command,Resource_class,Start_Time,End_Time,Statement_Type,Status

SynapseSqlPoolExecRequests
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where StatementType !in ('Batch','Execute') and RequestId == '{RequestId2}'
| summarize 
    Request_ID=any(RequestId),
    Start_Time=max(StartTime),
    End_Time=max(EndTime),
    Command=any(Command),
    Status=min(Status), //This works because Completed/Failed/Cancelled are all below running, below suspended. This happens to work out where the min is the current status
    Statement_Type=any(StatementType),
    Resource_class=any(ResourceClass)
    by RequestId
| summarize Start_Time=any(Start_Time), End_Time=any(End_Time),ElapsedTime_min=anyif((End_Time - Start_Time)/1m,Start_Time > ago(30d)),Command=any(Command),Status=any(Status),Statement_Type=any(Statement_Type),Resource_class=any(Resource_class) by Request_ID
| project Request_ID,ElapsedTime_min,Command,Resource_class,Start_Time,End_Time,Statement_Type,Status

SynapseSqlPoolRequestSteps 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where RequestId == '{RequestId1}'
| summarize StartTime=max(StartTime)
    ,EndTime=max(EndTime)
    ,RequestID=max(RequestId)
    ,Operation=max(OperationType)
    ,RowCount=max(RowCount)
    ,Command=max(Command)
    ,Status=max(Status)
     by StepIndex
| order by StepIndex asc
| project StartTime,EndTime,RequestID,Operation,RowCount,Command,Status,StepIndex

SynapseSqlPoolRequestSteps 
| where _ResourceId  == '{DatabaseResourceName}'
| where RequestId == '{RequestId2}'
| summarize StartTime=max(StartTime)
    ,EndTime=max(EndTime)
    ,RequestID=max(RequestId)
    ,Operation=max(OperationType)
    ,RowCount=max(RowCount)
    ,Command=max(Command)
    ,Status=max(Status)
     by StepIndex
| order by StepIndex asc
| project StartTime,EndTime,RequestID,Operation,RowCount,Command,Status,StepIndex

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
        | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
        | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
        | where StatementType_s =='CreateStatistics'
    | summarize 
        Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
        //Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
        Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
        //Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
        //End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
        End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
        Command=max(Command_s), 
        Last_Status=min(Status_s),
        Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
        Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
        by RequestId_s
        | where Submit_Time > datetime('{Query_Submit_Time1}') and End_Time < datetime('{Query_End_Compile_Time1}') and End_Time > ago(30d)
| project Command, Status=Last_Status ,Submit_Time,End_Time,Session_ID,Request_ID=RequestId_s,Statement_Type

items.name: All possibly related auto-stats statements - Copy - Copy

content.json: The matching of the user information in the next chart is approximate. This information is a work in progress

content.query:
let databasename='{DatabaseName}';
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == databasename
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize Query_End_Time = max(EndTime_t ) by SessionId_s
| where SessionId_s == '{SessionID}'
| join kind = rightouter 
(  
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents' 
    | where duration_milliseconds_d > 0
    | extend duration_seconds = duration_milliseconds_d /1000.0
    | where statement_s != 'select @@version' and statement_s != 'SELECT @@SPID;' and server_principal_name_s != '##MS_InstanceCertificate##'
) on $left.Query_End_Time==$right.event_time_t 
| summarize DatabaseName= max(database_name_s)
    , UserName= any(server_principal_name_s)
    , Host= max(host_name_s)
    , Application=max(application_name_s)
     by SessionId_s

AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize 
    Session_ID=max(SessionId_s),   
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Command=max(Command_s), 
    Last_Status=min(Status_s),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
    by RequestId_s
| where Session_ID has '{SessionID}'
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| order by Submit_Time asc

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category  == 'RequestSteps'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where RequestId_s == '{RequestID}'
//| where Status_s != 'Running'
| summarize Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),End_Time=max(EndTime_t),Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),Operation_Type=max(OperationType_s),Row_Count=max(RowCount_d),Statement=max(Command_s),Status=min(Status_s) by StepIndex_d
| order by StepIndex_d asc

content.json:
## This tab is used to determine what statements triggerred autostats creation jobs. 
The flow of autostats creation is as follows
1. Query Submit Time
2. 	Create Statistics submit Time
3. 	Create Statistics end Time
4. Query end_compile_time
5. Query Start_Time
6. Query End_Time

Further, if multiple stats are created, then the creation of all stats for this query will fall between query submit_time and end_compile_time. 

The charts on this page allow you to search for an autostats job by requestID or my snippet of the autostats statement text, which can just be the schema, table, or column name. Then it will show you all commands that include that request ID or text. It will then show you all statements in the create stat statement because the query we are trying to identify will wait for all of those stats creations to complete before proceeding. 

The last chart will list out all statements that could possibly have triggerred the stats creation job based on their submite/end_compile_time.

parameters.name: QueryTextSnippet
parameters.label: Snippet of autostats creation statement (Schema, table or column)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| summarize 
    Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
    Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
    Submit_Time=max(SubmitTime_t), 
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Command=max(Command_s), 
    Last_Status=min(Status_s),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
    by RequestId_s
| where Command has 'CREATE STATISTICS _wa_sys'
| where Command has '{QueryTextSnippet}'
and RequestId_s has '{RequestIdSearch}'
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
| order by elapsedTime_sec
| summarize 
    Executions = count(),
    Max_Elapsed_Time_sec = bin(max(elapsedTime_sec),1),
    Min_Elapsed_Time_sec = bin(min(elapsedTime_sec),1),
    Variability_sec=bin((max(elapsedTime_sec)-min(elapsedTime_sec)),1),
    SampleQID = any(RequestId_s),
    SampleSessionID = any(Session_ID)
    by Command
| order by Max_Elapsed_Time_sec
content.title: Matching Queries

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where RequestId_s == '{SampleQID}'
| summarize 
    Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
    Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
    Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
    Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
    End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
    End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
    Command=max(Command_s), 
    Last_Status=min(Status_s),
    Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
    Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
    by RequestId_s
| extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
| extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
| join kind=inner
    (AzureDiagnostics 
    | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
    | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
    | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
    | summarize 
        Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
        Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
        Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
        Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
        End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
        End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
        Command=max(Command_s), 
        Last_Status=min(Status_s),
        Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
        Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
        by RequestId_s
    | extend elapsedTime_sec = (End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
    | extend elapsedTime_sec = iif(End_Time > ago(365d),(End_Time - Submit_Time)/1s,real(null)) 
    | extend CompileTime_sec = (End_Compile_Time - Submit_Time)/1s
    )
on Command 
| project Request_ID1,Session_ID1,Submit_Time1,Start_Time1,End_Compile_Time1,End_Time1,Last_Status1,Statement_Type1,elapsedTime_sec1,CompileTime_sec1
content.title: All Executions of Selected Query
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see individual executions

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
        | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
        | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
        | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
        | where SessionId_s == '{SessionId}'
        | summarize 
            Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
            Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
            Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
            Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
            End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
            End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
            Command=max(Command_s), 
            Last_Status=min(Status_s),
            Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
            Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
            by RequestId_s
| project Session_ID,Request_ID,Submit_Time,End_Compile_Time,Start_Time,End_Time,Last_Status,Statement_Type,Command
content.title: All Statements in Stats Statement Session
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see individual executions

parameters.name: Session_Submit_Time
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where SessionId_s == '{SessionId}'
| summarize 
    Session_Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t) 
    by SessionId_s
| project Session_Submit_Time

parameters.name: Session_End_Time
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where SessionId_s == '{SessionId}'
| summarize 
    Session_End_Time=max(EndTime_t) 
    by SessionId_s
| project Session_End_Time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
| where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
| where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
| where SubmitTime_t < datetime('{Session_Submit_Time}') and EndCompileTime_t > datetime('{Session_End_Time}') or RequestId_s == '{RequestId}'
| summarize by RequestId_s
| join kind=inner
    (
        AzureDiagnostics 
        | where Category  == 'ExecRequests'
        | where Resource  == '{DatabaseName}'
        | where StatementType_s !in ('Batch','Execute')
        | summarize 
            Session_ID=max(SessionId_s), 
            Request_ID=max(RequestId_s),  
            Submit_Time=min(SubmitTime_t), 
            Start_Time=max(StartTime_t),
            End_Compile_Time=max(EndCompileTime_t), 
            End_Time=max(EndTime_t), 
            Command=max(Command_s), 
            Last_Status=min(Status_s),
            Statement_Type=max(StatementType_s),
            Resource_class=max(ResourceClass_s) 
            by RequestId_s
    ) on RequestId_s
| order by End_Compile_Time
| project Session_ID,Request_ID,Submit_Time,End_Compile_Time,Start_Time,End_Time,Last_Status,Statement_Type,Command
content.title: Query Executions that could have triggered Stats Statement based on Time of total session
content.noDataMessage: Select a query above to see individual executions
